name: Refoil
description:
All alone with no recollection of his life before, our hero fights his way through legions of alien creatures, guided by a glimmer of hope that he'll find out why he is here and where he belongs.

A difficult never-ending and ever-changing maze is ahead of you. Permadeath is almost certain, chances of success: quite low. Are you up for the challenge?

Game features:

• Metroidvania jewel. Classic 2D action with challenges at every step.
• Explore a world that’s always changing. Levels re-arrange with each new playthrough.
• Various builds that allow you to customize and master your tactics.
• Evolve and improve your skills as you advance through the game.
• The game's difficulty and your enjoyment go hand in hand. You’ll rage when you die, but you’ll most definitely continue your arduously epic quest.

In the end, it all comes down to this:

Fight and die. Resurrect and get back out there.
